channel.title: In response...to "Loose change"
channel.description:
www.zeitgeistmovie.com/
If you haven't seen this before, and have 2 hours to spend watching it...it'll blow your mind...I'm not going to say this is true or false, it's just another weird thing to think about.

item.title: In response...to "Loose change"
item.dc:creator: @lordslayer565 lordslayer565
item.description:
@lordslayer565 wrote:

That video is just BS. If you think its real read this: http://www.thebestpageintheuniverse.net/c.cgi?u=911_morons . I have’nt really watched the video because people are saying stuff like “Holy shit! watch this video! its freaky!” buy manily for the fact its 2 hours long and it would be a waste of my time.

Read full topic
